# HKCategoryValueAppleStandHour.stood

**Case**

The user stood up and moved for at least one continuous minute during the sample.

## Declaration

```swift
case stood
```

## Constants

- **HKCategoryValueAppleStandHour.idle**: The user didn’t stand up and move for at least one continuous minute during the sample.

items.description: The user didn’t stand up and move for at least one continuous minute during the sample.
items.name: HKCategoryValueAppleStandHour.idle
